description: These falafel burgers are extra herby and zesty and are delicious on their own or stuffed in a pita.
name: Baked Falafel Burgers Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 medium red onion, peeled, 1 chopped, 1 finely sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 180°C/160°C fan-forced. Place the chickpeas, chopped red onion, garlic, parsley, coriander, spices, lemon zest and half the lemon juice in a food processor. Add the flour and pulse to form a smooth dough. Shape into 4 patties with your hands.
Brush the burgers with oil and place on a baking tray. Bake for 20-25 minutes until golden, turning halfway through.

Whisk the remaining lemon juice and tahini into the yoghurt and add a tablespoon of water to loosen. Toast the pita breads, spread with tahini yoghurt, add cherry tomatoes and sliced red onion and serve.
